title: WHEN TIGER ASSETS ARE CONFISCATED, INCREASING SALARIES IS NOT DIFFICULT: RANIL
content: Salaries can be increased by confiscating the assets of Tigers, says Ranil Wickremasinghe, Opposition leader. The leader of the United National Party (UNP) said that the government had broken two promises – to confiscate Tiger assets and to increase salaries. “When the assets of Tigers are confiscated, increasing salaries is not difficult,” said the opposition…
